channel.title: Model Help
channel.description:
So I followed this tutorial : http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/models/114285-barbarian-assault-npcs-models-ints.html
I did everything the tut told, but when I spawned the npcs they didn't look like the barb assault npcs at all. In fact they are just some weird things. Now my guess is that i've put the models in the wrong place. I honestly don't know but it must be a problem with the models.
please help?
in other words: I just don't know what to do with my npc models.

item.title: Model Help
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

So I followed this tutorial : http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/models/114285-barbarian-assault-npcs-models-ints.html

I did everything the tut told, but when I spawned the npcs they didn’t look like the barb assault npcs at all. In fact they are just some weird things. Now my guess is that i’ve put the models in the wrong place. I honestly don’t know but it must be a problem with the models.

please help?

in other words: I just don’t know what to do with my npc models.
